scripts.pod:install: cd Example; pod cache clean --all; rm -rf Pods; pod install; cd -
scripts.pod:lint: pod cache clean --all; pod lib lint --swift-version='4.0' --no-clean --verbose --sources='https://github.com/CocoaPods/Specs'; cd -
scripts.xcode:info: cd Example; xcrun simctl list; xcodebuild -workspace UIViewDidAppear.xcworkspace -list; cd -
